title: OpenType v1.6 specification published
content:
The newest version of the OpenType font format specification, 1.6, has now been published on the Microsoft website:  
 [http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106065250/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/ "http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/")

Of particular interest, I think, will be the new mechanism for naming of Stylistic Sets  
 [http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/features\_pt.htm#ssxx](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106065250/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/features_pt.htm#ssxx "http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/features\_pt.htm#ssxx")

and the new Character Variant features  
 [http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/features\_ae.htm#cv01-cv99](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106065250/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/features_ae.htm#cv01-cv99 "http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/features\_ae.htm#cv01-cv99")

For other additions and revisions, see the change log  
 [http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/changes.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106065250/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/changes.htm "http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/changes.htm")
author: John Hudson
